## Description

EliceLab NestJS One-Day Bootcamp Complete Code



## Download

```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/joke716/shop_elicelab.git
```

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install
```

## Docker

```bash
$ docker-compose up -d
```


## Running the app

```bash
# development
$ npm run start

# watch mode
$ npm run start:dev

# production mode
$ npm run start:prod
```

## Test

```bash
# unit tests
$ npm run test

# e2e tests
$ npm run test:e2e

# test coverage
$ npm run test:cov
```
